Hero.description: Story: Mr. Red Face, a fictional character created by adults to teach their children. It's said that he often appears late at night to give gifts to well-behaved kids. But is the story of Mr. Red Face really that simple?

Showcase.title: Showcase
Showcase.description: Ron, the main character of the game, who will witness the suffering that Mr. Red Face brings to his family.
